title: How to cash this cheque that I have received - Quora

response.answer_text: The cheque is meant for you and you have no doubt about it Go to your bank branch or ATM lobby and pick up the remittance challan, fill up the challan with necessary details namely - name, account number, amount, cheque number, bank on which cheque has been drawn etc. and submit the cheque along with challan to the bank officer or drop the cheque in the drop box. You will be getting the amount in your account subject to balance in the account

Hi, u just have to go to bank. Take a pay in slip. Put all your details along with cheque details. Also write ur name, account number and contact number on the back of cheque. U may drop the cheque in ATM or give it across the counter. If u are giving the cheque to bank official across the counter them make sure to receive the smaller slip along with bank stamp stamp stating received on it as the proof. Your cheque will take approx 2 days to get cleared and get transferred to your a/c.
